verses.verse: In that day, <S%H3117><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> will be sung <S%H7891><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> "We have a strong <S%H5797><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%> God appoints <S%H7896><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> for walls <S%H2346><s%> and bulwarks. <S%H2426><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> the gates, <S%H8179><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> may enter: <S%H935><s%> the one which keeps <S%H8104><s%> faith. <S%H529><s%>
You will keep <S%H5341><s%> whoever <S%H3336><s%>'s mind is steadfast <S%H5564><s%> in perfect <S%H7965><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> because he trusts in you. <S%H982><s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> for in Yah, <S%H3050><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> Rock. <S%H6697><s%>

For he has brought down <S%H7817><s%> those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> the lofty <S%H7682><s%> city. <S%H7151><s%> He lays it low. <S%H8213><s%> He lays it low <S%H8213><s%> even to the ground. <S%H776><s%> He brings <S%H5060><s%> it even to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
The foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread it down; <S%H7429><s%> Even the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the poor, <S%H6041><s%> and the steps <S%H6471><s%> of the needy. <S%H1800><s%>"
The way <S%H734><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is uprightness. <S%H4339><s%> You who are upright <S%H3477><s%> make <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of the righteous level. <S%H6662><s%>

Yes, <S%H734><s%> in the way of your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> have we waited <S%H6960><s%> for you. <S%H8034><s%> Your name and your renown <S%H2143><s%> are the desire <S%H8378><s%> of our soul. <S%H5315><s%>

With my soul <S%H5315><s%> have I desired <S%H183><s%> you in the night. <S%H3915><s%> Yes, <S%H7307><s%> with my spirit within <S%H7130><s%> me will I seek you earnestly; <S%H7836><s%> for when your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

Let favor be shown <S%H2603><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> yet he will not <S%H1077><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> In the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H5229><s%> he will deal wrongfully, <S%H5765><s%> and will not <S%H1077><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s majesty. <S%H1348><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> is lifted up, <S%H7311><s%> yet they don't <S%H2372><s%> see; but they will see <S%H2372><s%> your zeal <S%H7068><s%> for the people, <S%H5971><s%> and be disappointed. <S%H954><s%> Yes, <S%H784><s%> fire will consume <S%H398><s%> your adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you will ordain <S%H8239><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for us, <S%H6466><s%> for you have also worked all our works for us. <S%H4639><s%>

Yahweh <S%H113><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> other lords <S%H3068><s%> besides <S%H2108><s%> you have had dominion <S%H1166><s%> over us, <S%H2142><s%> but by you only will we make mention of your name. <S%H8034><s%>

The dead <S%H4191><s%> shall not live. <S%H2421><s%> The deceased <S%H7496><s%> shall not rise. <S%H6965><s%> Therefore have you visited <S%H6485><s%> and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H2143><s%> and caused all memory of them to perish. <S%H6><s%>

You have increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> O Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> You have increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation! <S%H1471><s%> You are glorified! <S%H3513><s%> You have enlarged <S%H7368><s%> all the borders <S%H7099><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in trouble <S%H6862><s%> they have visited <S%H6485><s%> you. <S%H6694><s%> They poured out a prayer <S%H3908><s%> when your chastening was on them. <S%H4148><s%>

Like <S%H3644><s%> as a woman with child, <S%H2030><s%> who draws near <S%H7126><s%> the time of her delivery, <S%H3205><s%> is in pain <S%H2342><s%> and cries out <S%H2199><s%> in her pangs; <S%H2256><s%> so we have been before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.

We have been with child. <S%H2029><s%> We have been in pain. <S%H2342><s%> We gave birth, <S%H3205><s%> it seems, <S%H3644><s%> only to wind. <S%H7307><s%> We have not worked <S%H6213><s%> any deliverance <S%H3444><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H1077><s%> have the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

Your dead <S%H4191><s%> shall live. <S%H2421><s%> My dead bodies <S%H5038><s%> shall arise. <S%H6965><s%> Awake <S%H6974><s%> and sing, <S%H7442><s%> you who dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the dust; <S%H6083><s%> for your dew <S%H2919><s%> is like the dew <S%H2919><s%> of herbs, <S%H219><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> will cast forth <S%H5307><s%> the dead. <S%H7496><s%>

Come, <S%H3212><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into your rooms, <S%H2315><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> your doors <S%H1817><s%> behind you. <S%H2247><s%> Hide yourself for a little <S%H4592><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> until the indignation <S%H2195><s%> is past. <S%H5674><s%>

For, <S%H3068><s%> behold, Yahweh comes forth out <S%H3318><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> to punish <S%H6485><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> also will disclose <S%H1540><s%> her blood, <S%H1818><s%> and will no longer cover <S%H3680><s%> her slain. <S%H2026><s%>
